original_text: And Esther spake yet again before the king, and fell down at his feet, and besought him with tears to put away the mischief of Haman the Agagite, and his device that he had devised against the Jews.
korean_text: 에스더가 다시 왕 앞에서 말씀하며 왕의 발 아래 엎드려 아각 사람 하만이 유다인을 해하려 한 악한 꾀를 제거하기를 울며 구하니

sentences.original_text: And Esther spake yet again before the king
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 에스더는 왕 앞에서 다시 말했다

sentences.original_text: and fell down at his feet
to put away the mischief of Haman the Agagite
and his device that he had devised against the Jews
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 유대인들에게 꾸며낸 그의 계획을 없애달라고
